name: RocketStarz
storyline: It is the year 2069. Haunted animatronics have leaked from a pizzeria and taken over the major cities; they are slowly conquering the world. You are learning to be an astronaut for the HHSSA (Hillsborough High-School Space Association). Your mission is to safely navigate the stars and fly the last of humanity safely to a colony established in Mars. Sadly you are only an intern, and all the professional astronauts have been eliminated by the Animatronics. The HHSSA has setup obstacle courses to test your skill and help you learn so you can safely save humanity.
summary: Blast of into space and defend the earth from an alien invasion in RocketStarz, a game created by high school students! RocketStarz is a challenging game where you maneuver your way out of tight obstacles and fight your way across the oceans of purple alien animatronics with the help of your trusty shockwave cannon - all while listening to a banging original soundtrack! Be careful cadet, as this mission is not for the faint of heart...
